Covid-19 Update

12 August 2020

Due to new instances of community trasmission of Covid-19, Auckland is going to be back in Self-Isolation as of 12pm noon on Wednesday the 12th of August (today!).

This means Varsity Toastmasters will not be meeting on campus.

For tonight's meeting, we'll be using Zoom. Here's the link!
